thread.title: Najib Hails From Powerful Family
thread.title_full: Najib Hails From Powerful Family - WSJ

author: Tom Wright
title: Najib Hails From Powerful Family
text:
Prime Minister Najib Razak was born into power and wealth in Malaysia’s Pahang state. His maternal grandfather was an investor in Malaysia’s first casino, and he helped found the country’s ruling party, which has headed every government since independence from Britain in 1957. Mr. Najib’s father and uncle were prime ministers.
Mr. Najib’s father, Abdul Razak Hussein, was famously frugal. The youngest brother, Nazir Razak, who is chairman of a Malaysian bank, wrote last year how their father had denied requests for a... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
